title: 服务器开着开着 就会自动关闭 求大佬看一眼
author: Chengguan233
txt_content:

replies.author: dilong_dada
replies.txt_content: 把光影核心删了应该就行了

replies.author: Ridicule
replies.txt_content: 是服务器刚加了地图还是插件？

是最近加了什么插件吗？之前有这种情况吗？
或者看看最近加了什么模组和插件。
或者看看是不是服务器内存太低

replies.author: Chengguan233
replies.txt_content: [20:06:51 ERROR]: Fatal errors were detected during the transition from PREINITIALIZATION to INITIALIZATION. Loading cannot continue[20:06:51 ERFOR]

replies.txt_content:
Chengguan233 发表于 2020-2-17 20:11
[20:06:51 ERROR]: Fatal errors were detected during the transition from PREINITIALIZATION to INITIAL ...
服务器内存调的多少？
顺便发发服务器的插件列表

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
Exception in server tick loop
服务器内部循环出现问题
可尝试优化模组列表或者
尝试安装VanillaFix修复此问题
